info.title: GRR Rapid Response API
info.description: GRR Rapid Response is an incident response framework focused on remote live forensics.

servers.description: Root path of the GRR API

RDFDatetime.description: the number of microseconds since epoch to a timestamp

RDFDatetimeSeconds.description: the number of seconds since epoch to a timestamp

Duration.description: the number of microseconds between two timestamps

post.description: Labels given clients with given labels.

200.description: The call to the AddClientsLabels API method succeeded.

default.description: The call to the AddClientsLabels API method did not succeed.

post.description: Stop given flow on a given client.

200.description: The call to the CancelFlow API method succeeded and it returned an instance of grr.ApiFlow.

default.description: The call to the CancelFlow API method did not succeed.

200.description: The call to the CreateClientApproval API method succeeded and it returned an instance of grr.ApiClientApproval.

default.description: The call to the CreateClientApproval API method did not succeed.

get.description: List client approvals of a current user in reversed timestamp order.

schema.description:
ANY == 0
VALID == 1
INVALID == 2

200.description: The call to the ListClientApprovals API method succeeded and it returned an instance of grr.ApiListClientApprovalsResult.

default.description: The call to the ListClientApprovals API method did not succeed.

default.description: The call to the CreateCronJobApproval API method did not succeed.
